players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "I find it strange that Bob was the one who was found dead last night. Let's be vigilant and make sure we all stay safe."
Charlie: "I agree with Diana. Let's keep a close eye on each other to ensure everyone's safety."
Diana: "I'm concerned about the recent turn of events. Let's try to uncover who might have harmed Bob and ensure that no one else gets hurt."
Charlie: "I believe we should all cooperate and work together to uncover the truth behind Bob's death. Let's share any information we may have and keep an open mind."
